Description.LocalizedString:
Inspired by the dark mangas created by her father, The Skull Merchant relentlessly hunts her prey using the latest in surveillance technology.

Press the Power button to deploy a Drone that creates a Detection Zone inside which the Killer is Undetectable and Survivors’ Lock On meter fills. When no Survivor is detected for a while, the Drone begins a continuous sweeping scan. If a survivor is scanned, the Drone becomes active.

Survivors can hack Drones. Failure activates the Drone and immediately fills their Lock On meter; Success removes the Drone but gives the Survivor a Claw Trap.

A Claw Trap broadcasts the Survivor’s location to the Killer and makes other nearby drones unhackable. Claw Traps break when their batteries die and when a Survivor performs a fast vault, which also destroys the pallet.

SPECIAL ABILITY: RADAR
Press the Ability Button to open a Radar to see the locations of Survivors in Detection Zones or with Claw Traps. Each Survivor detected on the Radar increases The Skull Merchant’s movement speed. Drones can be manually activated or recalled with the Radar.

SPECIAL EFFECT: LOCK ON
The Lock On meter fills when detected by a Drone and when failing to disable a Drone. When the meter is full, the Survivor is revealed by Killer Instinct while inside Detection Zones and is Exposed  until the meter depletes after leaving Detection Zones or entering the dying state.
